definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: However, church leaders in Malawi urged the government to maintain the current laws.
sentences.chinese: 然而，馬拉威的教會領袖敦促政府要保持目前的法律。

sentences.english: Agnes and her mother were among the 1.1 million recipients across Malawi.
sentences.chinese: 阿內絲和媽媽，是馬拉威一百一十萬接受戶之一。

sentences.english: Indeed, I was very struck about the situation in Malawi in January of this year.
sentences.chinese: 真的，我對今年一月馬拉威的情況甚感驚訝。
